name: Patty Hawk's Pro (Impossible) Burger
description:
Patty Hawk's Pro Burger tells a tale as old as time. For centuries, people have argued that for something to be a 'burger' it must contain meat. 

Not today. 

You play as Potato&Soy Boy on a quest to prove that the impossible burger is, in fact, possible. 

To do this, complete objectives during 2 minute rounds.  Complete them all and finish the game!

WASD moves the patty. Mouse moves the camera. 'Q' slams the patty down. 'TAB' lets you view all discovered objectives. 'ESC' pauses the game. 

A game by People With Weird Beards. Adrian Campos, Tyler Hillis, Nayan Patel, Zachary Roberts.

World Record Speedrun of all objectives: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4VyEDQY1Ohs&feature=youtu.be
